about_the_game:
FlopShot is a multiplayer FPS designed for those who thrive on speed, chaos, and parkour. Dive into arenas with up to 32 players and test your limits as you rack up kills. It’s all about fast-paced action—wall-running, sliding, and building momentum to outsmart and outrun your opponents.

Features

  • Multiplayer

  • PVP (Player versus Player)

  • Fast-Paced Gameplay

This isn’t just another shooter. FlopShot blends competitive shooting with platforming in a way that feels fresh and exciting. The minimalist sci-fi aesthetic is sleek and clean, while dynamic lighting gives the arenas a cool vibe without going over the top. The focus? Pure gameplay. It’s challenging enough to push your skills but easy for anyone to jump in and have fun.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or SteamOS 2.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU (Intel HD Graphics 2000 or Mesa-compatible GPU)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported
  • Additional Notes: Since the game is still in development, the system requirements may be subject to change and could be inaccurate.

short_description: FlopShot throws you into chaotic battles with up to 32 players, where everyone’s a ragdoll. Slide, wall-run, dodge, and outplay opponents in fast-paced, physics-based parkour FPS action. Despite the floppy chaos, movement stays tight and responsive, keeping the action nonstop. Ready to jump in?
